name: Two way Horror
description:
WARNING: This game is still under development. Sounds, art and/or design don't represent the final product!

This is my first horror game, I tried to use only a few inputs and mechanics to make the game as simple as possible but still scary.

Any feedbacks and/or bugs you find please don't hesitate to leave in the comments, always helps a lot!

Enjoy! :o
developers: Luís Felipe de  Ávila e Silva
